name: NSTextSelection
desc: A class that represents a single logical selection context that corresponds to an insertion point.

items.name: init(NSTextLocation, affinity: NSTextSelection.Affinity)
items.desc: Creates a new text selection with the location and selection affinity you provide.

items.name: init(range: NSTextRange, affinity: NSTextSelection.Affinity, granularity: NSTextSelection.Granularity)
items.desc: Creates a new text selection with the range, selection affinity, and granularity you provide.

items.name: init([NSTextRange], affinity: NSTextSelection.Affinity, granularity: NSTextSelection.Granularity)
items.desc: Creates a new text selection with the ranges, selection affinity, and granularity you provide.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a test selection from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var affinity: NSTextSelection.Affinity
items.desc: Returns the selection affinity of the text selection.

items.name: enum NSTextSelection.Affinity
items.desc: Values that describe the visual location of the text cursor, or the direction of the non-anchored edge of the selection.

items.name: var anchorPositionOffset: CGFloat
items.desc: Represents the anchor position offset from the beginning of a line fragment in the visual order for the initial tap or click location.

items.name: enum NSTextSelection.Granularity
items.desc: Values that describe the different granularities available to make a selection.

items.name: var isLogical: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the framework interprets the selection as logical or visual.

items.name: var isTransient: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates transient text selection during drag handling.

items.name: var secondarySelectionLocation: NSTextLocation?
items.desc: Specifies the secondary character location when user taps or clicks at a directional boundary.

items.name: protocol NSTextLocation
items.desc: An interface you implement that represents an abstract location inside your documentâ€™s content.

items.name: var textRanges: [NSTextRange]
items.desc: Represents an array of noncontiguous logical ranges in the selection.

items.name: var typingAttributes: [NSAttributedString.Key : Any]
items.desc: The template attributes the framework uses for characters that replace the contents of this selection.

items.name: func textSelection([NSTextRange]) -> NSTextSelection
items.desc: Creates a subselection of the current text selection with the ranges you specify.
